dictionary.Achtung! Es werden Seiten, Vorlagen und/: Attention! Some pages, layouts, and/or modules are currently being edited. All unsaved changes will be lost.
dictionary.Alle Änderungen müssen gespeichert oder: All changes must be saved or discarded before an import can be done. The following tabs are affected:

All changes must be saved to display a preview.
You have unsaved changes in {type} “{name}” . Save it?

dictionary.Es konnten nicht alle Dateien erfolgreic: Not all files are uploaded successfully. Incorrect files are highlighted in the list.
